subject: Leadership
title: Indra Nooyi and Stakeholder Leadership
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Indra Nooyi and Stakeholder Leadership.

hook.text: PepsiCo's CEO bet the company on healthy products. Wall Street wanted quick profits. She chose the long game.

buildup.text: Nooyi's 'Performance with Purpose' strategy: financial returns, environmental care, and human sustainability together.

discovery.text: She expanded healthy options while maintaining the core business. Both-and thinking, not either-or. Balance as strategy.

twist.text: As a woman of color leading a Fortune 50 company, Nooyi faced extra scrutiny. Representation at the top shifts norms.

climax.text: Stakeholder leadership means serving employees, communities, and investors simultaneously. It's harder but more durable.

punchline.text: She proved you don't have to choose between doing well and doing good.

quiz.question: What was Nooyi's 'Performance with Purpose' strategy?
options: Combining financial returns with environmental and human sustainability
